post.description: Executes a smart contract code without saving state

200.description: Return value of the executed smart contract

post.description: Executes a smart contract transction without created a transaction and saving data

200.description: Hex of estimated gas price of smart contract call
Data stored at the smart contract location
JSON Array of JSON Object : validator wallet address, delegator wallet address, amount, reward, undelegations
JSON Array of JSON Object : validator wallet address, delegator wallet address, amount, reward, undelegations
Array of Object : validator wallet address, delegator wallet address, amount delegated in Atto, unclaimed reward in Atto, undelegations
Array of String : List of wallet addresses that have created validators on the network
If txType was False, only the hashes will be provided as opposed to the whole transaction.
If txType was False, only the hashes will be provided as opposed to the whole transaction.

pageIndex.title: Pageindex
pageIndex.description: Optional, which page ofo transactions to return, default 0

pageSize.title: Pagesize
pageSize.description: Optional, how many transactions to display per page, default 1000

fullTx.title: Fulltx
fullTx.description: Optional, return full transaction data or just transaction hashes, default false

txType.title: Txtype
txType.description: Optional, which type of transactions to display ('ALL','RECEIVED', or 'SENT'), default 'ALL'

order.title: Order
order.description: Optional, sort transactions in ascending or descending order based on timestamp ('ASC' or 'DESC'), default 'ASC'
